title: DK MedCom Core
introduction: MedCom Core FHIR profiles for Denmark

list.desc: Continuous Integration Build (latest in version control)

list.descmd: *  MedComCoreMedia, MedComCoreObservation and MedComCore DiagnosticReport added. All profiles are developed and intended to be part of a production trial of the communication between the general practitioner and municipal acute care team.
- Moved extensions from the CareCommunication IG to this IG and updated the names and descriptions.

- The profile MedComCoreCareTeam is added to describe careteams involved in patient care.
- In MedComCorePractitionerRole profile is the element organization made MustSupport.
